title: Integration tests for existing ralph behavior
description: Write integration tests that capture current ralph.zsh behavior BEFORE refactoring. These tests will catch regressions during MP-006 migration.

acceptanceCriteria.text: === CHARACTERIZATION TESTS ===
Test: ralph --help shows all flags
Test: ralph 1 runs single iteration (mock Claude)
Test: ralph reads prd-json/index.json correctly
Test: ralph updates story criteria when checked
Test: ralph moves completed story to completed array
Test: ralph respects --gap flag for sleep
Test: ralph --notify sends ntfy notification
=== STATUS FILE TESTS ===
Test: ralph writes ~/.ralph-status.json during run
Test: status file contains iteration, story, model, lastActivity
=== UPDATE.JSON TESTS ===
Test: ralph processes update.json at iteration start
Test: update.json newStories are added to pending
=== TEST INFRASTRUCTURE ===
Tests in tests/integration/ directory
Mock Claude responses for predictable testing
All tests pass: ./tests/integration/run.sh
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
